TopicTitle: [1.2.2] Contract Pack: Bases and Stations 3.6.1 (30/04/2017) (formerly Kerbin Space Station)

Articles.Content:
17 hours ago, severedsolo said:

I'll support any issues that arise as a direct result of this update until 7 May 2017 when support will officially end.

I missed something. Are you quitting modding?

33 minutes ago, garwel said:

I missed something. Are you quitting modding?

TL:DR - Not quitting modding completely, but dropping the contract packs.
@severedsoloThanks for all of your work on this mod (and others).  I've quite enjoyed this contract pack in my current career game.

20 hours ago, severedsolo said:

TL:DR - Not quitting modding completely, but dropping the contract packs.

That's a shame, but we owe you a lot for your work. Thank you!

On 5/1/2017 at 8:35 AM, severedsolo said:

TL:DR - Not quitting modding completely, but dropping the contract packs.

Well, then thank you for making them! I hope somebody will take up this work.
indeed, thank you.

On 21.03.2015 at 2:40 PM, severedsolo said:

Please note that support for B&S will end on 7 May 2017

Oh.

Now maybe the community could help...

How to do it? I just evacuated the station, but when I try to launch the same rocket again, it doesn't count its name as correct. What should I do then? What is TBD here?

Thanks for your work! Looks fun to play. New challenges

But I have one problem with the Stations: It says: "Must have a part unlocked with deployable solar panel"  ...but I have plenty of those parts unlocked. Playing with Ven Stock Revamp, is it incompatible?

On 6/12/2017 at 6:30 AM, FuzzyHead said:

Thanks for your work! Looks fun to play. New challenges

But I have one problem with the Stations: It says: "Must have a part unlocked with deployable solar panel"  ...but I have plenty of those parts unlocked. Playing with Ven Stock Revamp, is it incompatible?

 

Heya, I've got the same issue. I don't suppose you've figured out how to fix it have you?
@FuzzyHead, @LemonSkin, I haven't had this problem but I do know that recent Versions of Kopernicus have been altering the stock solar panel module. Do you have Kopernicus?

45 minutes ago, Nightside said:

@FuzzyHead, @LemonSkin, I haven't had this problem but I do know that recent Versions of Kopernicus have been altering the stock solar panel module. Do you have Kopernicus?

I actually just discovered this! I've spent the last 45 mins trying to alter the config file in Bases and Stations to accept the new Kopernicus naming system. I'll upload the file with @severedsolo's permission if I can get it working

 

Edit: I believe I've fixed it, just waiting on permission, otherwise I'm happy to send the files directly if people PM me.

Edited June 15, 2017 by LemonSkin

53 minutes ago, LemonSkin said:

Edit: I believe I've fixed it, just waiting on permission, otherwise I'm happy to send the files directly if people PM me.

You don't need to ask that's the purpose of the MIT license, you can do what you like with it.

Edited June 15, 2017 by severedsolo

In that case, I've posted an unofficial update here:

https://github.com/LemonSkin/KerbinSpaceStation/releases/tag/3.6.2

I'll potentially be adding more to this in the future as I absolutely love this mod and don't want to see it disappear from the scene.

Please let me know if any further issues are found or if you have any specific requests and I'll try and make it happen.

Cheers!

Edited June 15, 2017 by LemonSkin
Updated file download location

3 minutes ago, LemonSkin said:

In that case, I've posted an unofficial update here:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/lw7axh9esrw5whv/Bases%26Stations3.6.2.7z?dl=0

I'll potentially be adding more to this in the future as I absolutely love this mod and don't want to see it disappear from the scene.

Please let me know if any further issues are found or if you have any specific requests and I'll try and make it happen.

Cheers!

Honestly, from the sound of it you should just take over official maintenance. 

Though as a warning: 7z files aren't as well-known as .zip files, and some people may not have a way to open them.

31 minutes ago, DStaal said:

Honestly, from the sound of it you should just take over official maintenance. 

Though as a warning: 7z files aren't as well-known as .zip files, and some people may not have a way to open them.

Okay cheers. I'm making a git repo now, I'll upload everything there and change the link when it's done.

As for taking over, I might give it a shot and set up a new forum page later this afternoon.

4 minutes ago, LemonSkin said:

Okay cheers. I'm making a git repo now, I'll upload everything there and change the link when it's done.

As for taking over, I might give it a shot and set up a new forum page later this afternoon.

sweet, would love to have this come back as an actively supported mod, with contract configurator back to being updated again.

Hey all, I've created a new forum thread for this: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/162133-13-contract-pack-bases-and-stations-continued/

Enjoy
I love this mod too.  Thanks to @severedsolo for all his outstanding work!

Thanks a lot for the fix @LemonSkin !

I have no Idea about coding but KSP makes me think maybe I should into this.

3 minutes ago, FuzzyHead said:

Thanks a lot for the fix @LemonSkin !

I have no Idea about coding but KSP makes me think maybe I should into this.

No worries  Be sure to check out the new thread to keep up to date

3 minutes ago, LemonSkin said:

No worries  Be sure to check out the new thread to keep up to date

I'll put a link to the new thread on the OP for you.

moved

Edited June 27, 2017 by Gordon Dry
